content:
Use Case 1: Submit game review
Actor: Customer
Basic Flow:

1. Customer navigates to the game's page on Steam
2. Customer clicks on the "Write a review" button
3. Customer selects a rating and writes a review
4. Customer submits the review

Alternative Flow 1: Review is denied due to violation of guidelines

* Customer is informed of the guideline violation and is prompted to edit their review before resubmitting it.

Alternative Flow 2: Review is pending moderation

* Customer is informed that the review is pending moderation and will be published once it's approved.

Alternative Flow 3: Review is approved and published

* Customer is informed that the review has been approved and is now visible on the game's page on Steam.

Alternative Flow 4: Customer updates the review

* Customer can update their review as many times as they want before the game is released.

Alternative Flow 5: Customer deletes the review

* Customer can delete the review at any time if they change their mind.
